name: Dark Gizmodo 2019 (Kotaku, io9, The Onion, Kinja)
description:
Darker and easier to read Kinja/Gawker sites with some added flair!

Click here to combine with my Trimmed Style for a better site experience!
additional_info:
--2019--
Aug 25-28 - Finally did an update. Lots of tweaks to make it all better.

--2018--
Aug 14 - Tweakies
Mar 6 - Little asthetic tweaks.

--2017--
Nov 16 - Tweaks!
Oct 22 - Added some new Gawker sites to the list and tweaks.
May 15 - Small update.
March 24 - More minor tweakings.
March 22 - Tweaks and improvements!
March 16 - Fancy updates. Made a smidge darker.
